Meet Susanna. She is a very special drawing by Rembrandt in the collection of the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam. While developing this code, I have spent an awful lot of time to reveal her secrets and those of x-ray fluorescence. Throughout this documentation we will look at the MA-XRF spectral image made by Leila Sauvage and her colleagues working in the paper conservation studio of the Rijksmuseum.

Susanna and the Elders (c.1650-c.1655) Rembrandt van Rijn, Rijksmuseum Amsterdam RP-T-1898-A-3689
